column1: Little Goat Diner////The first time I went I was mesmerized by the place
column2: by this last trip the wonder has worn off and all I am left with is a monster stomach ache.  Think greasy spoon (I mean REALLY greasy) meets stuffy
column3: pretentious pan-asian highbrow dinning. Corn beef and hash was nothing but slimy bacon DRENCHED in oily cheese.  I am talking inedible quantities of oil
column6: cheese.  Their asian burger was gross
column7: squash bun with kimchi.  Fries are unexciting.  Hashbrowns are so greasy and cheesy you cannot consume them.  Tuna melt mixes pickled vegetables
column8: the richest cheese sauce I have ever consumed soaked the entire bread and pungent fish meat.
